title: ObjectHeader
description: This is a container to display information about the header of an object. You can include an Object header extension cell item to display a custom extension in the Object Header container. You can add only one Object header as the first section in a table.

DataSubscriptions.description: Array of data change events to subscribe to.

Visible.description: Set the visibility of this control.

BodyText.description: A body label in the additional info view.

Description.description: A description label displayed in the description view.

DetailContentContainer.description: Can only contain one extension. Can't co-exist with `AnalyticView` or `KPIView`.

DetailImage.description: An image with size of 45px x 45px in compact mode or 70px x 70px in regular mode for detail image view

DetailImageIsCircular.description: If the value is True, the image is displayed in a circular shape.

Footnote.description: A footnote label in the additional info view.

HeadlineText.description: A headline label in the object name and title view.

StatusPosition.description: Indicate the position of status and substatus with three layout options: stacked vertically (at the top corner of the screen), inline (below the tags), and cross-wise layout where status is at the top corner of the screen and substatus is inline below the tags. if `KPIView` is defined, the `StatusPosition` would be disregarded, and the position will always stay as inline below tags.

StatusImage.description: A status image displayed in the status view. It’s expected to either set `StatusText` or `StatusImage` to display either one as the same position. When both are set, `StatusImage` would be displayed in priority.

StatusImagePosition.description: Indicate the image position for status should be before the text or after.

StatusText.description: A status label displayed in the status view. It’s expected to either set `StatusText` or `StatusImage` to display either one as the same position. When both are set, `StatusImage` would be displayed in priority.

Subhead.description: A sub-headline label in the object name and title view.

SubstatusImage.description: A substatus image displayed below status view. It’s expected to either set `SubStatusText` or `SubStatusImage` to display either one as the same position. When both are set, `SubStatusImage` would be displayed in priority.

SubstatusImagePosition.description: Indicate the image position for substatus should be before the text or after.

SubstatusText.description: A substatus label displayed below status view. It’s expected to either set `SubStatusText` or `SubStatusImage` to display either one as the same position. When both are set, `SubStatusImage` would be displayed in priority.

Labels.description: A list of tag labels to be shown below the `Tags`. If the `Labels` has been defined, the `BodyText` and `Footnote` will be hidden.

AnalyticView.description: An analytic content view containing either a `Chart` or a `KPI`. Can't co-exist with `DetailContentContainer`.

Target.description: Only the first record of any entity set returned by the target will be used.

OnPress.description: Required to navigate to a full screen chart when the Analytic View is pressed.

Target.description: Only the first record of any entity set returned by the target will be used.

Styles.description: An object of style class names to be applied on the object header properties.

ObjectHeader.description: The string value is a style class name of `ObjectHeader`. iOS and Android only.

BodyText.description: The string value is a style class name of `BodyText`.

Description.description: The string value is a style class name of `Description`.

Footnote.description: The string value is a style class name of `Footnote`.

HeadlineText.description: The string value is a style class name of `HeadlineText`.

StatusText.description: The string value is a style class name of `StatusText`.

Subhead.description: The string value is a style class name of `Subhead`.

SubstatusText.description: The string value is a style class name of `SubstatusText`.

DetailImage.description: The string value is a style class name of `DetailImage`.

StatusImage.description: The string value is a style class name of `StatusImage`.

SubstatusImage.description: The string value is a style class name of `SubstatusImage`.

KPITintColor.description: The string value is a style class name for configuring the tint color of the KPI in Object Header.

KPICaption.description: The string value is a style class name for configuring the font-size, color and font-style of the KPI Caption Label.

KPIIcon.description: The string value is a style class name for KPI icon of the KPI in Object Header.

ChartTitle.description: The string value is a style class name for Chart Title. This is supported only for iOS, not for Android.

ChartSubTitle.description: The string value is a style class name for Chart SubTitle. This is supported only for iOS, not for Android.

ChartTrendTitle.description: The string value is a style class name for Chart Trend Title. This is supported only for iOS, not for Android.

ChartTrendImage.description: The string value is a style class name for Chart Trend Image. This is supported only for iOS, not for Android.

ChartKPIUnit.description: The string value is a style class name for KPI Unit items inside Chart. This is supported only for iOS, not for Android.

ChartKPIValue.description: The string value is a style class name for KPI Value items inside Chart. This is supported only for iOS, not for Android.

ChartKPIIcon.description: The string value is a style class name for KPI icon inside Chart. This is supported only for iOS, not for Android.

NoDataText.description: The string value is a style class name of `NoDataText` inside Chart. Android only. `font-typeface` attribute not supported.
